Name: elmah.io - Register Deployment
Description: Step template for notifying elmah.io about deployments on Octopus.
Author: thomasardal

Parameters.Name: ApiKey
Parameters.Label: API Key
Parameters.HelpText: Required: Input your elmah.io API key located on the organization settings page.

Parameters.Name: LogId
Parameters.Label: Log ID
Parameters.HelpText: Optional: As default, new deployments are shown on all logs on the organization. If you want the deployment to show up on a single log only, input the ID of the log here.
